rules_text:
If you control a land, Ichthyic Grave enters tapped.
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}, Pay 1 life: Add {G} or {U}.
{1}{G}{U}: Until end of turn, Ichthyic Grave becomes a 3/3 Sand land creature. Whenever it attacks this turn, choose up to three cards in graveyards. Their owners shuffles those cards into their libraries.
